author: gstein
msg: Check in some in-process work on a second generation API for serf. Some of
the basic concepts here are from discussions at ApacheCon 2002. Some notes
about that design are in trunk/docs/processing.txt, although this first
draft has not been correlated with those notes (yet).
* serf/branches/gen2: new directory to hold the "second gen" code
* serf/branches/gen2/serf.h: new main header
* serf/branches/gen2/serf_bucket_types.h: the various bucket types, in the
new serf bucket model.

author: gstein
msg: various updates, a few new open issues

author: gstein
msg: Port over a change that Ken Coar made to the CVS version of this file on
April 18th. The log message for that change (rev 1.55) was:
make a note of the irc changes

author: gstein
msg: Various updates and bookkeeping...
* adjust the set of committers and vote recording.
* note that code donations _must_ come thru the Incubator; we cannot
override that policy.
* some votes have been outstanding for so long, that I'm calling them
"closed". opposing views can simply reopen the decisions:
- components will go into the 'asf' SVN repos as commons/COMPONENT/
- we will not be renaming the Project
* adjust serf info based on its recent move.

author: gstein
msg: minor tweaks
